name: Neon Influence
description:
Hey, my name is Pablo Lario, and I am the developer of Neon Influence. By the time I publish this game I am 19 years old and I am studying Informatic Engineering in Spain. I would like to become a game developer in a near future. I hope you like Neon Influence!!!

Neon influence is a Hyper Casual game for mobile phones, where you have to get the maximum score by avoiding the enemies that appear in the sides.
